What is the purpose of the `verus` command `getcurrencyconverters` with a single currency argument, such as `verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc`?

The `getcurrencyconverters` command is not intended to be used with a single currency argument. It is meant to be used with two currencies as arguments, such as `verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc eth`, which returns all currencies that have BTC/ETH markets at or above the liquidity threshold.

o, and have all listed currencies as reserves
- **E.g. BTC ETH:**
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc eth
```
Will return all currencies that have btc/eth markets at or above the liquidity threshold.
